title: Effect of increased D on SR, LR olive oil prices

content.question: Assume that olive oil is produced in a constant- cost, perfectly competitive industry, which is currently in long-run equilibrium. If the current price of olive oil is $5 per quart and the demand for olive oil increases, then the price of olive oil will change in which of the following ways in the short run and long run?

choices.label:
Short Run
 Long Run

Be more than $5
 Be more than $5

Short Run
 Long Run

Be more than $5
 Be equal to $5

Short Run
 Long Run

Be equal to $5
 Be equal to $5

Short Run
 Long Run

Be less than $5
 Be less than $5

Short Run
 Long Run

Be less than $5
 Be equal to $5

content.answer:
Short Run
 Long Run

Be more than $5
 Be equal to $5

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

topic.text: 3.6: Firms' Short-Run Decisions to Produce and Long-Run Decisions to Enter or Exit a Market

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
